official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to transfer to the State of Illinois title to certain Federal lands in South Shores State Park, Illinois.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to transfer specified lands in South Shores State Park, Lake Carlyle, Illinois, to Illinois for the development of recreational opportunities. Requires that such development not interfere with the Lake Carlyle flood control project.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to transfer to the State of Illinois title to certain Federal lands in South Shores State Park, Illinois.
